original_text: So the servant took her out and then he locked the door. Tamar was wearing a beautiful long dress. All the king's daughters who were not yet married wore beautiful dresses like that.
korean_text: 암논의 하인이 그를 끌어내고 곧 문빗장을 지르니라 다말이 채색옷을 입었으니 출가하지 아니한 공주는 이런 옷으로 단장하는 법이라

sentences.original_text: So the servant took her out
and then he locked the door
Tamar was wearing a beautiful long dress
sentences.korean_translation: 다말은 아름다운 긴 드레스를 입고 있었습니다
